== dictionaries/rougail/01-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
leader:
  follower3:
    description: the follower3
----
== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
leader:
  description: a leadership
  type: leadership
  leader:
    description: the leader
    multi: true
  follower1:
    description: the follower1
  follower2:
    description: the follower2
----
